title: DDoS is back
body: Happen in my last 2 games with teammates now it's happening to me. Laptop is fine, used Google chrome to see if internet is working and it is. Client won't load keeps kicking me.

replies.body: Do you a record in the have match history after the game?

Highly unlikely that both the servers for the client/matchmaking and the game servers would get DDoSed at the same time, and DDoSing the client servers would be challenging anyway..

And there are not widespread issues. Most likely it is your connection, either overuse/errors in LAN or your ISP doing something stupid.
